title: ã€Nikon Z 4K Timelapseã€‘Mt.Fuji "THE SUMMIT" ã€œæ—¥æœ¬æœ€é«˜å³° 3,776m å¯Œå£«å±±é ‚ã®çµ¶æ™¯ã€œ
description:
This is a video that was shown at the Nikon booth at the camera festival "CP+" held in Yokohama in February 2024.
For about a month from July to September 2023, I took pictures while working part-time near the summit of Mt. Fuji. This video is created from a time-lapse shot during that time.
Photographing the summit of Mt. Fuji, sunsets, starry skies, and sunrises in harsh environments has given me a great deal of experience.
ã€Cautionã€‘ Through my work at Mt. Fuji, I am fully trained before photographing. Shooting overnight is very dangerous, so please do not do it without sufficient physical strength and preparation.

title: Aomori Seasons 2020ï½œé’æ£®ã®å››å­£ï½œãƒ‰ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ³æ’®å½±
description:
Aomori is that prefecture in Northern Japan where the fir trees covered with rime are called snow monsters, where people speak Tsugaru and Nambu Dialect and chant the Nebuta song in summer and where the snowiest inhabited place on Earth is called Sukayu.

2020 was the year when I was able to visit hidden gems located in Aomori Prefecture and it was the year when I realized again that we are one with the nature and we should protect it and care about it as much as we can.

Thank you Aomori.

Dolphin's video was added thanks to Mr. Ito, my drone teacher from Drone Link Academy.
